question: I am trying to figure out what could be causing strong numbness sensation in my right foot.  The sensations come on with I rub the inside of my foot with my heel.  I get strong pins and needles.  I don't get it on the other foot.  The sensations eventually die down.I was tested for diabetes 4 months ago and I have normal blood sugar.   Could this be a clogged artery in my foot?!?!
title: Numbness When Rubbing My Foot
